column5: I feel for the families.  But I have to wonder just what they were thinking.  http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2595244/Seven-killed-Bangkok-workers-tried-dismantle-Second-World-War-bomb-blowtorch.html
They were probabaly thinking that it would be a real blast to sell all that metal. HH
its called the thinning of the heard !!!!

Natural selection   Darwin at work folks.   They were probabaly thinking that it would be a real blast to sell all that metal. HH   its called the thinning of the heard !!!!  Peopled died, and you make jokes about it. Karma! muddler
Karma rules dictate that bad karma cannot cross the international date line, so I think we are safe... HH
Wanna bet? You reap what you sow.
Peopled died, and you make jokes about it. Karma! muddler  People died because they were stupid.  Very very stupid.
" thought the bomb was no longer active "  I dispute that thinking was involved.
Wanna bet? You reap what you sow. Well, if I find a WW2 bomb in my backyard, I'll be sure to take this under advisement. HH
Peopled died, and you make jokes about it. Karma! muddler Yup In life can be found death and satire can be found in both. even when it happens closer to home. There is a report button. Use it wisely.
there's lots of scrap metal there now

Peopled died, and you make jokes about it. Karma! muddler Relax, it is kinda funny and im a firm believer in Karma. Even  I laughed..Hey if your going to do something that stupid, then were going to laugh..Plain and simple.

Relax, it is kinda funny and im a firm believer in Karma. Even  I laughed..Hey if your going to do something that stupid, then were going to laugh..Plain and simple. I wonder, if it was a member of your family that died trying to feed their kids would you still be laughing?  I think there are some very insensitive replies on this thread, it's disapointing!
